# identifier

**Instance Property**

A developer-defined value you use to identify the card.

## Declaration

```swift
var identifier: String { get }
```

## Information for displaying an addable card

- **art**: An image to that the system displays to the user when they add or select the card.
- **title**: A name for the pass that the system displays to the user when they add or select the card.

items.description: An image to that the system displays to the user when they add or select the card.
